name: inC++
description:
inC++ was developed with inspiration from musical minimalism. Minimalist composers often use repetitive rhythms and melodies that overlap and phase with each other, sometimes very structured and sometimes up to the players discretion.

Terry Reily's In C on youtube

In this game each element of the level is assigned a sound and will activate based on  a variety of rhythms it will cycle through. Each level will be different on each playthrough and may range from chaotic to not overwhelmingly chaotic.

The players goal is to stay on top of the large moving platform; not being on the platform will lower your score, as will being hit by red level elements. Collect golden 8th notes to increase your score multiplier, which will have a large impact on your final score.

Sound is very important for this game so be sure to plug in headphones and adjust the volume accordingly, or for the daring plug in a speaker and treat everyone around to a recital of minimalism inC++.

Controls:

Use A/D to move left/right and space to jump. Holding shift will give you access to a stronger jump.
